title: Have someone ever taken a bigger than normal dose of ayahuasca? What were the effects?
description: Answer (1 of 3): Yes, I have. First I can tell you that everything Andy said is absolutely on the money. Ayahuasca is a totally subjective experience. I have drank it 50 times since May this year, thats 50 times in seven months. I am inPeru and have been staying with an amazing family in the Jung...
